content.description: To confirm Ohm’s law, an experiment is performed with a battery, an ammeter, a voltmeter, and a resistor connected as shown above.
content.question: Which of the following factors would most likely be the reason why the student’s measured current could be slightly more than the current predicted using Ohm’s law?

choices.label: The internal resistance of the battery
The resistor heating up over time

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
